title: Ernie Matching中能否做简单缓存提升预测速度
body:
```
class PointwiseMatching(nn.Layer):
    def __init__(self, pretrained_model, dropout=None):
        super().__init__()
        self.ptm = pretrained_model
        self.dropout = nn.Dropout(dropout if dropout is not None else 0.1)

        # num_labels = 2 (similar or dissimilar)
        self.classifier = nn.Linear(self.ptm.config["hidden_size"], 2)

    def forward(self,
                input_ids,
                token_type_ids=None,
                position_ids=None,
                attention_mask=None):

        _, cls_embedding = self.ptm(input_ids, token_type_ids, position_ids,
                                    attention_mask)

        cls_embedding = self.dropout(cls_embedding)
        logits = self.classifier(cls_embedding)

        return logits

```

请问这一步可以将两个句子的向量进行拆分，分别存入一个dict中吗？这样在二次执行时能提升预测速度。（尝试过使用静态图部署的，但是预测速度无法满足需求）

```
 _, cls_embedding = self.ptm(input_ids, token_type_ids, position_ids,
                                    attention_mask)
```

title: faq_finance保险问答未提供处理后的数据集
body:
页面上只提供了原始数据集的下载链接。代码不能直接跑起来。
将政务问答的数据集挪过来用，又提示缺少train_aug.csv。如果就用train.csv代替，则模型训练感觉不太正常。在checkpoints/下仅生成了model0的模型。而不像政务问答那样会每训练50步保存一次，根据batch_size不同，会训练200~400步左右。
奇怪的是，就使用得到的model0进行build_index和evaluate，成绩也跟政务问答差不多，大概是82、94、96。
总之希望还是提供能直接运行代码的数据集，便于验证代码是否正常运行。

body:
1）版本、环境信息
- PaddleNLP 2.2.6
- PaddlePaddle-gpu 2.2.2
2）系统环境
windows10，CUDA 11.0  Python3.8
3）复现信息
您好，在复现[examples\few_shot\p-tuning](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/61685f0e5013d58e26162c23d11e9c234e859467/examples/few_shot/p-tuning)的代码过程，根据README.md要求在Terminal中成功运行了训练&评估代码，如下：
`python -u -m paddle.distributed.launch --gpus "0" ptuning.py --task_name "tnews" --device gpu --save_dir "checkpoints" --batch_size 32 --learning_rate 5E-5 --epochs 10 --max_seq_length 128 --rdrop_coef 0 
`
发现在验证和测试阶段会出现不同的答案，如图所示，验证和测试分数有这明显差异
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68628239/170041954-63b890a4-35f9-4e55-b271-b525aed6cd0c.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68628239/170042033-ad5734ae-a0d8-47d9-b5ae-b65b57492084.png)
随后我检查了代码中的随机种子，和model.eval()，代码并无缺失可正常运行。
通过排查发现在train阶段模型能够参数能被固定，但在传入验证和测试阶段时，模型每一次得到的参数都不一样，请问这有可能是什么造成的，如何解决呢？

title: NER任务：doccano.py和utils.py在处理验证集时会导致验证集中无实体的样本被剔除，可能影响真实验证效果
body:
NER任务中，doccano.py在将数据集添加负样本时，会跳过数据集中无实体的样本，这个步骤会被用到验证集的分割转换中，导致验证集中的无实体样本被跳过，可能无法得到有效的验证。

F.cross_entropy(logits.reshape([-1, len(label2id)]), labels.reshape([-1]), ignore_index=-1)

import os
import argparse
from functools import partial
import paddle
import paddle.nn.functional as F
from paddlenlp.metrics import ChunkEvaluator
from paddlenlp.datasets import load_dataset
from paddlenlp.data import Pad, Stack, Tuple
from paddlenlp.transformers import SkepTokenizer, SkepModel, LinearDecayWithWarmup

import data_cls
import data_ext
from utils import set_seed
# 数据加载
train_path = "../data/data121190/train_ext.txt"
dev_path = "../data/data121190/dev_ext.txt"
test_path = "../data/data121190/test_ext.txt"
label_path = "../data/data121190/label_ext.dict"

# load and process data
label2id, id2label = data_ext.load_dict(label_path)
train_ds = load_dataset(data_ext.read, data_path=train_path, lazy=False)
dev_ds =  load_dataset(data_ext.read, data_path=dev_path, lazy=False)
test_ds =  load_dataset(data_ext.read, data_path=test_path, lazy=False)

# print examples
for example in train_ds[9:11]:
    print(example)

# 将数据转换成特征形式
model_name = "skep_ernie_1.0_large_ch"
batch_size = 8
max_seq_len = 512

tokenizer = SkepTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_name)
trans_func = partial(data_ext.convert_example_to_feature, tokenizer=tokenizer, label2id=label2id, max_seq_len=max_seq_len)
train_ds = train_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=False)
dev_ds = dev_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=False)
test_ds = test_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=False)

# print examples
for example in train_ds[9:11]:
    print("input_ids: ", example[0])
    print("token_type_ids: ", example[1])
    print("seq_len: ", example[2])
    print("label: ", example[3])
    print()


# 构造DataLoader
batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Tuple(
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),
        Stack(dtype="int64"),
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val= -1)
    ): fn(samples)

train_batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(train_ds, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=True)
dev_batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(dev_ds, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=False)
test_batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(test_ds, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=False)

train_loader = paddle.io.DataLoader(train_ds, batch_sampler=train_batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn)
dev_loader = paddle.io.DataLoader(dev_ds, batch_sampler=dev_batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn)
test_loader = paddle.io.DataLoader(test_ds, batch_sampler=test_batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn)

# 模型构建
class SkepForTokenClassification(paddle.nn.Layer):
    def __init__(self, skep, num_classes=2, dropout=None):
        super(SkepForTokenClassification, self).__init__()
        self.num_classes = num_classes
        self.skep = skep
        self.dropout = paddle.nn.Dropout(dropout if dropout is not None else self.skep.config["hidden_dropout_prob"])
        self.classifier = paddle.nn.Linear(self.skep.config["hidden_size"], num_classes)

    def forward(self, input_ids, token_type_ids=None, position_ids=None, attention_mask=None):
        sequence_output, _ = self.skep(input_ids, token_type_ids=token_type_ids, position_ids=position_ids, attention_mask=attention_mask)

        sequence_output = self.dropout(sequence_output)
        logits = self.classifier(sequence_output)
        return logits

# 训练配置
num_epoch = 3
learning_rate = 3e-5
weight_decay = 0.01
warmup_proportion = 0.1
max_grad_norm = 1.0
log_step = 20
eval_step = 100
seed = 1000
checkpoint = "./checkpoint/"

set_seed(seed)
use_gpu = True if paddle.get_device().startswith("gpu") else False
if use_gpu:
    paddle.set_device("gpu:0")
if not os.path.exists(checkpoint):
    os.mkdir(checkpoint)

skep = SkepModel.from_pretrained(model_name)
model = SkepForTokenClassification(skep, num_classes=len(label2id))

num_training_steps = len(train_loader) * num_epoch
lr_scheduler = LinearDecayWithWarmup(learning_rate=learning_rate, total_steps=num_training_steps, warmup=warmup_proportion)
decay_params = [p.name for n, p in model.named_parameters() if not any(nd in n for nd in ["bias", "norm"])]
grad_clip = paddle.nn.ClipGradByGlobalNorm(max_grad_norm)
optimizer = paddle.optimizer.AdamW(learning_rate=lr_scheduler, parameters=model.parameters(), weight_decay=weight_decay, apply_decay_param_fun=lambda x: x in decay_params, grad_clip=grad_clip)

metric = ChunkEvaluator(label2id.keys())


# 模型训练与测试
def evaluate(model, data_loader, metric):

    model.eval()
    metric.reset()
    for idx, batch_data in enumerate(data_loader):
        input_ids, token_type_ids, seq_lens, labels = batch_data
        logits = model(input_ids, token_type_ids=token_type_ids)

        # count metric
        predictions = logits.argmax(axis=2)
        num_infer_chunks, num_label_chunks, num_correct_chunks = metric.compute(seq_lens, predictions, labels)
        metric.update(num_infer_chunks.numpy(), num_label_chunks.numpy(), num_correct_chunks.numpy())

    precision, recall, f1 = metric.accumulate()
    return precision, recall, f1

def train():
    # start to train model
    global_step, best_f1 = 1, 0.
    model.train()
    for epoch in range(1, num_epoch+1):
        for batch_data in train_loader():
            input_ids, token_type_ids, _, labels = batch_data
            # logits: batch_size, seql_len, num_tags
            logits = model(input_ids, token_type_ids=token_type_ids)
            loss = F.cross_entropy(logits.reshape([-1, len(label2id)]), labels.reshape([-1]), ignore_index=-1)

            loss.backward()
            lr_scheduler.step()
            optimizer.step()
            optimizer.clear_grad()

            if global_step > 0 and global_step % log_step == 0:
                print(f"epoch: {epoch} - global_step: {global_step}/{num_training_steps} - loss:{loss.numpy().item():.6f}")
            if (global_step > 0 and global_step % eval_step == 0) or global_step == num_training_steps:
                precision, recall, f1  = evaluate(model, dev_loader,  metric)
                model.train()
                if f1 > best_f1:
                    print(f"best F1 performence has been updated: {best_f1:.5f} --> {f1:.5f}")
                    best_f1 = f1
                    paddle.save(model.state_dict(), f"{checkpoint}/best_ext.pdparams")
                print(f'evalution result: precision: {precision:.5f}, recall: {recall:.5f},  F1: {f1:.5f}')

            global_step += 1

    paddle.save(model.state_dict(), f"{checkpoint}/final_ext.pdparams")

# 模型评估
def model_evaluate():
    global skep, model
    # load model
    model_path = "./checkpoint/best_ext.pdparams"
    loaded_state_dict = paddle.load(model_path)
    skep = SkepModel.from_pretrained(model_name)
    model = SkepForTokenClassification(skep, num_classes=len(label2id))
    model.load_dict(loaded_state_dict)
    # evalute on test data
    precision, recall, f1 = evaluate(model, test_loader, metric)
    print(f'evalution result: precision: {precision:.5f}, recall: {recall:.5f},  F1: {f1:.5f}')




train_path = "../data/data121242/train_cls.txt"
dev_path = "../data/data121242/dev_cls.txt"
test_path = "../data/data121242/test_cls.txt"
label_path = "../data/data121242/label_cls.dict"

# load and process data
label2id, id2label = data_cls.load_dict(label_path)
train_ds = load_dataset(data_cls.read, data_path=train_path, lazy=False)
dev_ds =  load_dataset(data_cls.read, data_path=dev_path, lazy=False)
test_ds =  load_dataset(data_cls.read, data_path=test_path, lazy=False)

# print examples
for example in train_ds[:2]:
    print(example)


model_name = "skep_ernie_1.0_large_ch"
batch_size = 8
max_seq_len = 512

tokenizer = SkepTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_name)
trans_func = partial(data_cls.convert_example_to_feature, tokenizer=tokenizer, label2id=label2id, max_seq_len=max_seq_len)
train_ds = train_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=False)
dev_ds = dev_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=False)
test_ds = test_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=False)

# print examples
# print examples
for example in train_ds[:2]:
    print("input_ids: ", example[0])
    print("token_type_ids: ", example[1])
    print("seq_len: ", example[2])
    print("label: ", example[3])
    print()

batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Tuple(
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),
        Stack(dtype="int64"),
        Stack(dtype="int64")
    ): fn(samples)

train_batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(train_ds, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=True)
dev_batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(dev_ds, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=False)
test_batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(test_ds, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=False)

train_loader = paddle.io.DataLoader(train_ds, batch_sampler=train_batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn)
dev_loader = paddle.io.DataLoader(dev_ds, batch_sampler=dev_batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn)
test_loader = paddle.io.DataLoader(test_ds, batch_sampler=test_batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn)

class SkepForSequenceClassification(paddle.nn.Layer):
    def __init__(self, skep, num_classes=2, dropout=None):
        super(SkepForSequenceClassification, self).__init__()
        self.num_classes = num_classes
        self.skep = skep
        self.dropout = paddle.nn.Dropout(dropout if dropout is not None else self.skep.config["hidden_dropout_prob"])
        self.classifier = paddle.nn.Linear(self.skep.config["hidden_size"], num_classes)

    def forward(self, input_ids, token_type_ids=None, position_ids=None, attention_mask=None):
        _, pooled_output = self.skep(input_ids, token_type_ids=token_type_ids, position_ids=position_ids, attention_mask=attention_mask)

        pooled_output = self.dropout(pooled_output)
        logits = self.classifier(pooled_output)
        return logits

# 评论观点抽取模型
if __name__ == '__main__':
    train()
    model_evaluate()

title: GPT需要支持阅读理解（cmrc2018)和多项选择（CHID、C3）的任务吗
body:
疑问：
看这篇[论文](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2103.10385.pdf)是说GPT可以支持NLU任务（提到分类和阅读理解），但是不知道我们开源的`gpt-cpm-large-cn`和`gpt-cpm-small-cn-distill`是否支持阅读理解（cmrc2018)和多项选择（CHID、C3）的任务呢

如果需要的话，可能需要补充缺失的`MultipleChoice`和`QuesionAnswering`类让gpt-cpm-large-cn或者gpt-cpm-small-cn-distill跑起来这2类任务。

复现步骤：
```
cd PaddleNLP/examples/benchmark/clue/mrc
python run_cmrc.py --model_name_or_path gpt-cpm-small-cn-distill  --do_train
python run_c3.py --model_name_or_path egpt-cpm-small-cn-distill --do_train
```
TIPS：
HF dataset数据下载过程如果太长可以通过开关代理解决，为了减少数据处理时间，可以用slice方式只使用部分数据集，例如：
```
load_dataset("clue", "cmrc2018", "train[:1%]")
```

title: 自己的数据，定制训练UIE，模型提取将所有句子的句首部分信息完全丢失
body:
环境： linux/python3.8+/PaddleNLP-develop/paddlenlp 2.3.0/paddle2.2.1
例如 "脑内多发小缺血灶。双侧筛窦慢性炎症。双侧颈深上间隙淋巴结反应性增生。"
“脑内多发小缺血灶” 所有信息遗漏，其它部分的信息提取正确。
而且信息提取丢失呈现一定的规律，就是所有句子句首信息都提取不到，句子中部和后部的信息完成能提取到，很好奇这个是可能是因为什么原因？
完全按照https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/tree/develop/model_zoo/uie做的UIE finetune，
谢谢！
采用doccano数据标注
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29808550/169265965-c25fa290-f944-42a7-ab49-e52329c3ef9a.png)
{"id": 30, "text": "脑内多发小缺血灶；轻度脑白质变性。", "relations": [], "entities": [{"id": 166, "start_offset": 0, "end_offset": 2, "label": "part"}, {"id": 167, "start_offset": 4, "end_offset": 8, "label": "disease"}, {"id": 168, "start_offset": 9, "end_offset": 16, "label": "disease"}]}

其它样本举例
胃窦部慢性炎症，请结合胃镜随访。
{"id": 37, "text": "胃窦部慢性炎症，请结合胃镜随访。", "relations": [], "entities": [{"id": 200, "start_offset": 0, "end_offset": 3, "label": "part"}, {"id": 201, "start_offset": 3, "end_offset": 7, "label": "disease"}, {"id": 202, "start_offset": 8, "end_offset": 15, "label": "suggest"}]}
前列腺钙化灶。右肾小结石。
{"id": 27, "text": "前列腺钙化灶。右肾小结石。", "relations": [], "entities": [{"id": 153, "start_offset": 0, "end_offset": 3, "label": "part"}, {"id": 154, "start_offset": 3, "end_offset": 6, "label": "disease"}, {"id": 155, "start_offset": 7, "end_offset": 9, "label": "part"}, {"id": 156, "start_offset": 9, "end_offset": 12, "label": "disease"}]}

训练脚本
python finetune.py \
    --train_path "./data/train.txt" \
    --dev_path "./data/dev.txt" \
    --save_dir "./checkpoint" \
    --learning_rate 1e-5 \
    --batch_size 16 \
    --max_seq_len 512 \
    --num_epochs 100 \
    --model "uie-base" \
    --seed 1000 \
    --logging_steps 10 \
    --valid_steps 100 \
    --device "gpu"

预测
from pprint import pprint
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
schema = ['part', 'disease', 'evidence', 'result', 'suggest'] # Define the schema for entity extraction
ie = Taskflow('information_extraction', schema=schema, task_path=r'E:\PaddleNLP-develop\model_zoo\uie\checkpoint\model_1400') #  ['uie-base', 'uie-medical-base', 'uie-tiny']
pprint(ie("左侧咽旁间隙异常信号灶，FDG未见异常摄取，建议MR增强随访复查(3个月)。右侧颌下淋巴结FDG摄取增高，考虑为淋巴结反应性增生。"))

结果
[{'disease': [{'end': 64,
               'probability': 0.9999687673167728,
               'start': 56,
               'text': '淋巴结反应性增生'}],
  'evidence': [{'end': 21,
                'probability': 0.9999477869888551,
                'start': 12,
                'text': 'FDG未见异常摄取'},
               {'end': 11,
                'probability': 0.9999557738387068,
                'start': 6,
                'text': '异常信号灶'},
               {'end': 52,
                'probability': 0.9999815226331066,
                'start': 45,
                'text': 'FDG摄取增高'}],
  'part': [{'end': 45,
            'probability': 0.9999802113476477,
            'start': 38,
            'text': '右侧颌下淋巴结'}],
  'result': [{'end': 64,
              'probability': 0.9999666215932024,
              'start': 53,
              'text': '考虑为淋巴结反应性增生'}],
  'suggest': [{'end': 37,
               'probability': 0.9999763966967521,

“左侧咽旁间隙”这个就漏掉了。

如果输入为“胃窦部慢性炎症，请结合胃镜随访。”

body:
欢迎您反馈PaddleNLP使用问题，非常感谢您对PaddleNLP的贡献！
在留下您的问题时，辛苦您同步提供如下信息：
- 版本、环境信息
1）PaddleNLP和PaddlePaddle版本：请提供您的PaddleNLP和PaddlePaddle版本号，例如PaddleNLP 2.0.4，PaddlePaddle2.1.1

- 复现信息：如为报错，请给出复现环境、复现步骤

env：
paddle 2.2.2
paddleNlp 2.3.0

os:
Mac

python:
3.7.11

在wordtag任务里，我们需要传入一些实体，如：
BESTÅ/产品
贝达/产品
短绒/材质
长绒/材质
纺织品/材质
长方形/filter-shape
标准/filter-shape
标准/filter-color
标准/filter-material

其中有些实体会属于多种集合，比如上面的‘标准’，可能属于形状/颜色/材质，但是在真实识别中只会返回‘材质’这一个种类

root cause可能是在加载用户词典时，以token为key构建ac，后面加入的会把前面添加过的给覆盖掉？

title: 老师，为什么我的paddleNLP项目训练loss始终不下降？
body:
```python
# 导入模块

import os
import time
import random
import numpy as np
import json
from sklearn.metrics import f1_score, accuracy_score
from paddlenlp.metrics.glue import AccuracyAndF1
from functools import partial

# 飞桨API
import paddle
import paddle.nn as nn
import paddle.fluid as fluid
import paddle.nn.functional as F
import paddlenlp as ppnlp
from paddlenlp.losses import RDropLoss
from paddlenlp.data import Stack, Tuple, Pad
from paddlenlp.datasets import load_dataset
from paddlenlp.transformers import LinearDecayWithWarmup

# 可视化
from visualdl import LogWriter
# 读取训练数据
def read_train_text(data_path):
    with open(data_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        for line in f:
            data = line.strip('\n')
            
            dup_len = random.randint(a=1, b=int(DUP_RATE*len(data)))
            dup_index = random.sample(list(range(len(data))), k=dup_len)

            dup_ls = []
            for idx, token in enumerate(data):
                if idx in dup_index:
                    dup_ls.append(token)
                dup_ls.append(token)

            dup_data = ''.join(dup_ls)

            yield {'text1': data, 'text2': dup_data}
# 读取验证数据
def read_test_text(data_path):
    with open(data_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        for line in f:
            text1, text2, label = eval(line)
            yield {'text1': text1, 'text2':text2, 'label':int(label)}

# 转换词向量
def embedding(data, tokenizer):
    result = []

    for key, text in data.items():
        if 'label' in key:
            result += [data['label']]
        else:
            encoded_inputs = tokenizer(text=text)
            input_ids = encoded_inputs['input_ids']
            token_type_ids = encoded_inputs['token_type_ids']
            result += [input_ids, token_type_ids]

    return result
# 数据管道
def create_dataloader(dataset, mode='train', batch_size=1, batchify_fn=None, trans_fn=None):
    if trans_fn:
        dataset = dataset.map(trans_fn)

    shuffle = True if mode == 'train' else False
    if mode == 'train':
        batch_sampler = paddle.io.DistributedBatchSampler(dataset, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=shuffle)
    else:
        batch_sampler = paddle.io.BatchSampler(dataset, batch_size=batch_size, shuffle=shuffle)

    return paddle.io.DataLoader(dataset=dataset, batch_sampler=batch_sampler, collate_fn=batchify_fn, return_list=True)
class SEBT(nn.Layer):
    def __init__(self, ptm, bz, dr, output_emb_size):
        super().__init__()

        self.ptm = ptm
        self.bz = bz
        self.dr = nn.Dropout(dr if dr is not None else 0.1)
        self.emb = output_emb_size

        # # 维度变换，想得到output_emb_size维度的cls向量
        # if self.emb > 0:
        #     weight_attr = paddle.ParamAttr(initializer=nn.initializer.TruncatedNormal(std=0.02))
        #     self.linear_change_emb = paddle.nn.Linear(768, self.emb, weight_attr=weight_attr)

    def get_cls_embedding(self, input_ids, token_type_ids):
        
        _ , cls = self.ptm(input_ids, token_type_ids, None, None)

        # if self.emb > 0:
        #     cls = self.linear_change_emb(cls)
        
        cls = self.dr(cls)

        cls = F.normalize(cls, p=2, axis=-1)

        return cls


    def get_projected_embedding(self, input_ids, token_type_ids):
        
        cls = self.get_cls_embedding(input_ids, token_type_ids)

        project1 = fluid.layers.fc(input=cls, size = self.emb * 2, act='relu')
        project2 = fluid.layers.fc(input=project1, size=self.emb * 2, act='relu')
        project3 = fluid.layers.fc(input=project2, size=self.emb, act='relu')

        # 批次归一化
        batch_norm = nn.BatchNorm1D(project3.shape[-1])
        project3 = batch_norm(project3)

        return project1



    def get_loader_cls(self, dataloader):
        self.eval()
        with paddle.no_grad():
            for batch_data in dataloader:
                input_ids1, token_type_ids1, input_ids2, token_type_ids2, label = batch_data

                input_ids1 = paddle.to_tensor(input_ids1)
                token_type_ids1 = paddle.to_tensor(token_type_ids1)
                input_ids2 = paddle.to_tensor(input_ids2)
                token_type_ids2 = paddle.to_tensor(token_type_ids2)

                cls1 = self.get_cls_embedding(input_ids1, token_type_ids1)
                cls2 = self.get_cls_embedding(input_ids2, token_type_ids2)

                yield [cls1, cls2, label]

    def forward(self, input_ids1, input_ids2, token_type_ids1, token_type_ids2, para):
        prj1 = self.get_projected_embedding(input_ids1, token_type_ids1)
        prj2 = self.get_projected_embedding(input_ids2, token_type_ids2)        
        cross_corr = prj1.T @ prj2
        cross_corr = cross_corr / self.bz

        identity_diag = paddle.full(shape=[prj1.shape[-1]], fill_value=1, dtype=paddle.get_default_dtype())

        same_dimension = paddle.sum((identity_diag - paddle.diag(cross_corr))**2)
        other_dimension = paddle.sum((cross_corr - paddle.diag(paddle.diag(cross_corr)))**2)
        
        loss = same_dimension + para * other_dimension
        
        return loss
def evaluate(model, dataloader):
    loader_cls = model.get_loader_cls(dataloader)
    sim_all = []
    label_all = []

    for idx, (cls1, cls2, label) in enumerate(loader_cls):
        sim_all += list(F.cosine_similarity(cls1, cls2).numpy())
        label_all += list(label.numpy())

    pred_all = np.array(sim_all) > 0.5
    pred_all = pred_all + 0

    f1 = f1_score(pred_all, np.array(label_all))
    acc = accuracy_score(pred_all, np.array(label_all))

    return f1, acc
def train():
    
    paddle.set_device(device)
    
    # load and process data
    
    train_ds = load_dataset(read_train_text, data_path='work/data/train.txt', lazy=False)
    dev_ds = load_dataset(read_test_text, data_path = 'work/data/test.txt', lazy=False)
    tokenizer = ppnlp.transformers.BertTokenizer.from_pretrained('bert-base-chinese')
     
    trans_func = partial(embedding, tokenizer=tokenizer)

    

    batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Tuple(
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),  # query_input
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),  # query_segment
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),  # title_input
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),  # tilte_segment
    ): [data for data in fn(samples)]

    batchify_fn_test = lambda samples, fn=Tuple(
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),  # query_input
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),  # query_segment
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),  # title_input
        Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),  # tilte_segment,
        Stack()
        ): [data for data in fn(samples)]

    train_loader = create_dataloader(train_ds, mode='train',batch_size=batch_size, batchify_fn=batchify_fn, trans_fn=trans_func)
    test_loader = create_dataloader(dev_ds, mode='test',batch_size=100, batchify_fn=batchify_fn_test, trans_fn=trans_func)
    for idx, batch in enumerate(test_loader, start=1):
        if idx == 1:
            test_batch = batch
    # configure model training
    ptm = ppnlp.transformers.BertModel.from_pretrained('bert-base-chinese')
    model = SEBT(ptm, bz=batch_size, dr=0.2, output_emb_size=output_emb_size)

    num_training_steps = len(train_loader) * num_epochs
    lr_scheduler = LinearDecayWithWarmup(
        learning_rate=learning_rate,
        total_steps=num_training_steps,
        warmup=warmup_proportion)
    decay_params = [
        p.name for n, p in model.named_parameters()
        if not any(nd in n for nd in ["bias", "norm"])
    ]
    grad_clip = paddle.nn.ClipGradByGlobalNorm(max_grad_norm)
    
    #sgd = paddle.optimizer.SGD(learning_rate=0.1, parameters=linear.parameters(), weight_decay=0.01)
    optimizer = paddle.optimizer.AdamW(
        learning_rate=lr_scheduler,
        parameters=model.parameters(),
        weight_decay=weight_decay,
        apply_decay_param_fun=lambda x: x in decay_params,
        grad_clip=grad_clip)

    metric = AccuracyAndF1()

    # start to train model
    global_step, best_f1 = 1, 0.
    model.train()
    for epoch in range(1, num_epochs + 1):
        for batch_data in train_loader():
            input_ids1, token_type_ids1, input_ids2, token_type_ids2 = batch_data
            loss = model(input_ids1=input_ids1, input_ids2=input_ids2, token_type_ids1=token_type_ids1, token_type_ids2=token_type_ids2, para=para)

            t_input_ids1, t_token_type_ids1, t_input_ids2, t_token_type_ids2, label = test_batch
            t_loss = model(input_ids1=t_input_ids1, input_ids2=t_input_ids2, token_type_ids1=t_token_type_ids1, token_type_ids2=t_token_type_ids2, para=para)
            
            # logits: batch_size, seql_len, num_tags
            # logits = model(input_ids, token_type_ids=token_type_ids)
            # loss = F.cross_entropy(logits, labels)

            loss.backward()
            lr_scheduler.step()
            optimizer.step()
            optimizer.clear_grad()

            if global_step > 0 and global_step % log_steps == 0:
                print(
                    f"epoch: {epoch} - global_step: {global_step}/{num_training_steps} - loss:{loss.numpy().item():.6f}"
                )
            if (global_step > 0 and global_step % eval_steps == 0
                ) or global_step == num_training_steps:
                f1,acc = evaluate(model, test_loader)
                model.train()
                if f1 > best_f1:
                    print(
                        f"best F1 performence has been updated: {best_f1:.5f} --> {f1:.5f}"
                    )
                    best_f1 = f1
                    paddle.save(model.state_dict(),
                                f"{checkpoints}/best.pdparams")
                print(
                    f'evalution result: accuracy:{acc:.5f} F1: {f1:.5f}'
                )

            global_step += 1

    paddle.save(model.state_dict(), f"{checkpoints}/final.pdparams")

log_steps = 50
eval_steps = 50
seed = 1000
device = 'gpu'
DUP_RATE = 0.8
num_epochs = 10
batch_size = 32
learning_rate = 0.5
max_seq_len = 512
output_emb_size = 768
para = 0.2
max_grad_norm = 1.0
warmup_proportion = 0.1
weight_decay = 0.01
checkpoints = 'work/'
train()
```
